title: Bifacial tandem solar cells power generation density boost unleashed by high throughput optoelectrical modelling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01173B, Paper
Jiahong Tang, Junfeng Xue, Huaiwang Xu, Yujing Li, Shuping Lin, Boyan Li, Dalong Zhong, Gang Li, Yan Jiang, Qi Chen
The advancement of tandem and bifacial solar cells is an effective strategy for boosting the power conversion efficiency over state-of-the-art single-junction limit. In this study, a high-throughput optoelectrical modelling approach...
